duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide basic support services for Medical Office intake operations.
Assist with post-visit inter-departmental scheduling for patient visits, treatments, and procedures.
Obtain pre-authorizations/certifications for treatments and diagnostic procedures.
Maintain and receive files in an organized manner.
Distribute documents and forms for the area section.
Maintain supplies and cleanliness of space.
Assist, provide guidance, and train less senior staff.
Prepare routine memoranda, letters, labels, etc.
Maintain workload statistics and other data for departmental records.
Responsible for taking patient phone calls and scheduling over the phone.
Responsible for Pre-Authorizations and Certifications with the exception of surgical procedures.
Responsible for patient check-in and check-out.
Gather all patient demographic related data and materials from patients and/or their representatives.
Maintain cooperative and professional relationships with physicians, nurses, and office and clinical staff.
Types routine material such as forms and letters, envelopes, etc.
Answer patient questions to ensure understanding and patient satisfaction.
